title: Destroying Images & Watching Cartoons
transcript: shall i send you exactly on what the prophet had sent me not to leave a portrait without um disimaging it or you know destroying it so how would that go with us watching cartoons okay cartoons are not stills they're not hung on walls they're not with me all the time it's something that i watch and see those who created it those who drew it will be punished severely on the day of judgment those who watch it do not fall under that category and allah knows best
